Alert.ConfirmDel: Do you really want to delete
Alert.ErrXMLSupport: Browser does not support XML functions Supported from IE 5.0+, Mozilla 1.0+, Opera 7.60+ In IE the Security option 'Run ActiveX controls and plug-ins' must be enabled
Alert.ErrFormatReturn: Bad XML data was returned from server
Alert.ErrUpload: It is not certain that data have been uploaded correctly
Alert.AskTimeout: Cannot download data, server timeout ! Do you want to repeat request ?
Alert.AskUploadTimeout: Cannot upload data, server timeout ! Do you want to send data again ?
Alert.ErrPasteRange: Pasted range size [%d rows, %d columns] is not the same as selected area [%d,%d] ! Do you want to paste data anyway ?
Alert.PasteMore: Do you want to paste values to %d rows from actual row?
Alert.NoActivePage: There is no active page. Focus some row on page first.
Alert.ErrDragSelected: These selected rows cannot be dragged together
Alert.ErrAddSelected1: There are selected rows, but they cannot be moved or copied together!
Alert.ErrAddSelected2: There are selected rows, but they cannot be moved or copied to the target row!
Alert.AddEmpty: Do you want to add a new empty row?
Alert.ErrHide: You cannot hide all variable columns!
Alert.ErrHideExt: Width of all fixed columns is too wide!
Alert.ErrTextReturn: Server returned plain text instead of XML!
Alert.ErrHtmlReturn: Server returned HTML instead of XML!
Alert.ErrEmptyReturn:
Server response is empty!
Server must return XML with at least <Grid><IO Result='0'/></Grid>
Alert.ErrSetDebug: Set <treegrid ... Debug='1' ...> to see server response
Alert.ErrSeeDebug: Look at popup window or its source code to see server request and response
Alert.ErrPermitPopup: Permit popup windows to see server request and response
Alert.ErrPrintOpen:
The print window could not be opened
Permit popup windows to let print the grid
Alert.ErrPrint: The document was not successfully printed
Alert.ErrPageNoUrl: No Url set for page download! (<treegrid Page_Url=''>
Alert.NoDebugInfo: No information is provided due debugging level 0
Alert.ErrCheck: Synchronising with server failed! Do you want to temporary disable the checking for updates?
Alert.SearchHelp:
Enter string to search for like in Google
individual keywords separate by space phrases place into double quotes variants separate by uppercase OR keyword exceptions precede by "-" (minus)
Or enter expression to search by
specify columns caption to compare use operators < <= > >= = <> ( ) + - * / use AND OR keywords to join expressions use special keywords STARTS ENDS CONTAINS for comparing strings (NOT to negate) example: customer starts martin and date <= 1/1/2006
Alert.SearchStart: Nothing found Do you want to continue from beginning?

Text.DataErr:
TreeGrid cannot render
Missing or wrong input data
Text.BadLayoutErr:
Bad or missing TreeGrid layout !
TreeGrid cannot render
Minimal required layout is:
<Grid><Cols><C Name='Col'/></Cols>
<Body><B/></Body></Grid>
Text.BadLoadData:
Bad or missing TreeGrid data source!
TreeGrid cannot render
Set at least one data source attribute in <treegrid>:
Data_Url, Data_Tag, Data_Data,
Layout_Url, Layout_Tag, Layout_Data
Text.GroupCustom: To group by, drag column caption here ...
Text.Print:
Please wait while generating report for printing ...

If browser shows alert about slow script, do not choose to interupt the script otherwise printing will be unsuccessful.

Toolbar.Add: Add new row or move or copy selected rows
Toolbar.AddChild: Add new child row or move or copy selected rows to actual cursor position
Toolbar.Repaint: Refresh pages, click it if grid slows down
Toolbar.Sort0: Enable sorting and re-sort rows now
Toolbar.Sort1: Disable sorting to rearange sorting faster
Toolbar.Calc0: Enable calculations and re-calculate grid now
Toolbar.Calc1: Disable calculations to edit cell values faster
Toolbar.Columns: Displays menu to choose visible columns
Toolbar.Export: Export grid data to your spreadsheet program

MenuCfg.Caption: TreeGrid settings
MenuCfg.CheckUpdates: Check for updates on server every
